@BeingSalmanKhan @CMOMaharashtra @mybmc @AUThackeray @Iamrahulkanal Kindly extend #JantaCurfew till March end because threat is now increasing as 🇮🇳 going into stage 3 of #CoronavirusPandemic.
Great Hero @narendramodi has put outstanding example to world by #JantaCurfew.
